metadata.title: CVE-2019-3552 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: C++ Facebook Thrift servers (using cpp2) would not error upon receivingmessages with containers of fields of unknown type. As a result, maliciousclients could send short messages which would take a long time for theserver to parse, potentially leading to denial of service. This issueaffects Facebook Thrift prior to v2019.02.18.00.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
